dmca.title: [ADMINS] FW: igxe.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Carter 
Sent: Wednesday, September 06, 2006 8:44 AM
To: Legal
Cc: abuse; Admins
Subject: FW: [ADMINS] FW: igxe.com

Forwarding to legal.

-----Original Message-----
From: planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
[mailto:planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com] On Behalf Of Adlex Solicitors
Sent: Wednesday, September 06, 2006 4:32 AM
To: abuse; Admins
Subject: [ADMINS] FW: igxe.com

Dear Sirs 

We are surprised that you have not responded to the email below.

We are extending our original deadline for a final period of 7 days from today ie to
13 September 2006. If we do not receive your response by then, we will proceed as
previously indicated.

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Greenberg [mailto:djg@adlexsolicitors.co.uk]
Sent: 03 August 2006 13:18
To: 'abuse@theplanet.com'
Cc: 'admin@theplanet.com'
Subject: igxe.com

Dear Sirs

www.igxe.com ("the Website")

We act for Jagex Limited. Our client has owned and operated RuneScape, the
well-known online multiplayer adventure game, since 2001. There are currently some
4.1 million active registered players of the game in over 15 countries. Our client's
turnover in its last financial year to March 2005 was in excess of
